The young-looking elven mage/sorceress tells him that he has been developing such weapon for a long time, which will change the course of decision in battles, even with the numerical superiority of the enemy. He is not Aen Saevherne, but Francesca herself taught him a bit. After several years of tedious work, he was able to obtain a particularly toxic mixture by mixing white-hot phosphorus crystals and Ergot seeds. He says that the witcher is very suitable for him to experiment.
Ride Crucian.
West Velen
Crucian
I have a long way to go. Need to saddle Crucian.
Seems I'm here.
Insightful. Promising…
Who are you and what do you want?
Who are you and what do you want?
Set me free, you elf bastard!
Who are you and what do you want?
Set me free, you elven bastard!
And he's polite.

It's of little interest, considering what lies ahead, but I'll answer your questions.
My name is Emilia.
Great elf witch.
Lower your insignificant tone, lab rat.
My name is Emilia.
Great sorceress of Aen Seidhe.
And maybe then I'll tell you what awaits you.
I was trained by the Francesca Findabair, our Daisy of the Valleys. But now I'm improving myself in alchemy arts.
You see, I'm applying what I've learned to develop a substance that will enable elves to regain their rightful place.
After several years of tedious work, I was able to obtain a particularly mixture by mixing white-hot phosphorus crystals with ergot seeds.
However it's still not always mortal, and I need more subjects for experiments.
And that's where you come in, vatt'ghern. You are a godsend.
From what I hear, witchers have a particular metabolism that I think will be very suitable for my experiments.
We will start with small doses to find out how your body copes with the poison,  and I'll find a counter to it.
I've always been a supporter of the elves.
I always remain neutral about elves.
I hate elves.
This is a mistake, I always remain neutral about elves.
If you're not with us, you're against us.
This is a mistake, I've always been a supporter of the elves.
And I'm here to help another witcher named Geralt of Rivia.
He's been paralyzed from the attack of your henchmen, and won't survive long unless I bring back the ingredients to make an antidote.
So you are telling truth. If the witchers continue to side with us, it will be more useful than a dissection on my table.
I shall let you go.
Hurts to say this, but I have to find another body for my experiments.
But first, you have to sign this sort of non-disclosure agreement with your blood.
To make me sure you will never divulge what I'm up to here.
You say you're here to help Geralt of Rivia, but he's no friend of Aen Seidhe.
And the friends of my enemies are my enemies.
Don't get bored, I'll be back soon to test the new version of poison on you.
I'm gonna kill you!
Poor thing, sharp sword and stupid muscles won't help you. This cage could hold even a bear.
You didn't tie my hands.
You just called me an elven whore.
You can't be a friend of Aen Seidhe.
Gwynbleidd has helped Vernossiel.
Gwynbleidd has helped Iorweth.
Hate you all. I hope Dol Blatanna will die out completely soon.
That's not gonna happen. And for your filthy words, I'll cut out your tongue.
She forgot that witchers have signs. Aard will help me get this door out.

The combination of Cadfan's Grasp and Crifhau spells allows to create an alloy of substances with new properties. Although the technique needs to be improved, as the hot white phosphorus quickly ignites and turns into red phosphorus, which forms a non-toxic compound.
The average time to stop breathing of the subjects after inhaling the new toxic mixture:
human, male - 32 seconds
human, female - 29 seconds
human, child - 12 seconds
dwarf, male - 49 seconds.
However, single specimens demonstrate increased resistance, what is expressed in a reduction of breathing without complete stop. Unconsciousness lasts up to a day, after which death occurs. This drawback must be eliminated before the start of large-scale production of toxic bombs.

As a self-respecting sorceress, I also picked up an antidote in case of self-poisoning - Atropa belladonna extract in whale oil quickly relieves symptoms. However, an accurate calculation of the extract is necessary, since its overdose is also toxic.
